name: Solotech Solutions
overview:
Since our incorporation in year 2012, we, “Solotech Solutions”, are a trustworthy organization involved in manufacturing, supplying, trading, exporting, distributing, wholesaling and retailing a comprehensive range of Testing and Measuring Instruments.

Our ProductsL:

Multifunction Calibrator Temperature Calibrator Multifunction Process Calibrator Process Calibrator (V/mA) Thermocouple Resistance Calibrator Thermocouple Calibrator Calibrator

Our Vision: Our Vision statements are the building blocks of our company and our brand, from our operating principles and Values to our commitment to social responsibility. We are now at an important stage.

Our Mission: Ethics and transparency in all our business operations. Touch the hearts of customers by providing of superior quality products at a competitive price. Cultivate a lean and flexible business model throughout the value chain by continuous improvement.

Quality Assurance: In order to offer hallmark quality of Testing and Measuring Instruments, we strive to maintain best-in-class quality in our products. To maintain the same, we have adopted TQM policies and quality management system, which is installed at our infrastructure.

Client Satisfaction: We are dedicatedly worked towards serving our clients in a better manner, since our commencement. To offer a quality-approved range of Testing and Measuring Instruments, we procure raw material form the credible vendors of the industry, who are recognized vendors of the market
